headline: The AI spending boom is creating winners beyond the 'Mag 7.' Why one sector could see big gains.
summary: While the market has long been obsessed with chipmakers such as Nvidia and AMD, Morgan Stanley argues that the real value is now migrating to semiconductor equipment makers — the companies that build the multibillion-dollar machines used in fabrication plants.

raw.headline: The AI spending boom is creating winners beyond the 'Mag 7.' Why one sector could see big gains.

headline: Citi opens positive catalyst watch on KLA Corp ahead of investor day
summary: Investing.com -- Citi has placed KLA Corp on a 30-day positive Catalyst Watch ahead of the company’s 12 March Investor Day in New York, citing expectations for a stronger long-term financial model and potential product announcements.

headline: Investors Boost Semiconductor Spending Forecasts for KLA Corporation (KLAC)
summary: Aristotle Funds, an investment advisor, released its “Growth Equity Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. equity markets reached new all-time highs in Q4 2025, with the S&P 500 Index rising 2.66% and the Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Bond Index increasing by 1.10%. Within the Russell 1000 Growth Index, […]

headline: Congress takes on Nvidia, White House as it pushes for chip export limits
summary: A bipartisan group of lawmakers in both chambers is working to limit advanced chip exports to China.

raw.headline: Congress takes on Nvidia, White House as it pushes for chip export limits

headline: KLA (KLAC) Valuation Check As AI Chipmakers Rally On Nvidia Earnings Optimism
summary: AI optimism and sector move lifting KLA Today’s rally in AI related chipmakers has KLA (KLAC) trading more than 3% higher, as investors position ahead of Nvidia’s earnings and reassess semiconductor equipment exposure tied to artificial intelligence spending. See our latest analysis for KLA. Beyond today’s move, KLA’s recent share price performance has been strong, with a 90 day share price return of 33.44% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 111.02%, indicating strong momentum around AI...
